mapper.sql: id, name, survey, photo1, photo2, photo3, yhzh, createId, createTime, isdeleted
mapper.insert: insert into workshop_ent (name, survey, photo1, photo2, photo3, yhzh, createId, createTime, isdeleted) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{survey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update workshop_ent set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, survey = #{survey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo1 = #{photo1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo2 = #{photo2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo3 = #{photo3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yhzh = #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update workshop_ent set isdeleted = '1' where id = #{id}
